title: Ian Forrest's Data Science Portfolio
text: Hi, my name is Ian Forrest!  I'm a New York City based music lover aspiring to enter the data science field
subtitle: MY RECENT PROJECTS

home_items.name: Russian Arms Exporter Profiler
home_items.description: Contracted by Center for Advanced Defense Studies (C4ADS) to build text modeling product to detect unknown Russian arms exporters by analyzing trade data.

home_items.name: Spotify Song Recommender
home_items.description: An API/Machine Learning product to recommend songs for individual Users.

home_items.name: Twitoff
home_items.description: A Twitter analysis product designed to showcase text analysis, modeling, database architecture, front-end development, and back-end development skills.
